title: Conservative Journalist Andy Ngo On Antifa Attack: Over Two Months And Still Not One Arrest
text:
Rolling Stone published a piece this week titled "How a Right-Wing Troll Managed to Manipulate the Mainstream Media." The piece argues that it's a real shame Andy Ngo got beaten in the street by Antifa because that incident helped demonize masked, left-wing goons committed to political violence. The piece doesn't quite deny that Ngo was beaten to the point he had to be hospitalized with a brain hemorrhage but it does dance around it a bit. Ngo reacts. Plus: Has Justice been served for the conservative journalist? He gives Guy an update.

Listen Below:
